0P00000PQG.F.manager_bio: Claude Guerin is a Senior Portfolio Manager for BNP Paribas Asset Management. He is specialised in managing yield curve strategies for the European Fixed Income team and is responsible for the liaising with the Research and Strategy team, notably concerning geographical bloc allocations.He joined BNP Paribas Group in 1991, initially joining Courcoux Bouvet (a BNP Paribas brokerage subsidiary). In 1995 he moved to BNP Paribas Asset Managementâs French Fixed Income team, where he was responsible for French bond investments. He previously worked as bond manager for Banque West LB (Franco-Allemande, 1990 - 1991) and held a similar position with a subsidiary of MAAF, a French mutual insurance company (1985 â 1990). He began his career with Credit Mutuel du Sud-Ouest in 1982.Claude graduated from the Ecole Superieure de Commerce Administration des Entreprises (ESCAE/ Poitiers, France, 1981).

0P0000V70X.F.summary:
The fund invests principally in bond holdings denominated in Euro and, secondly in US dollar, Yen, GBP, CHF and in money market.
It invests mainly in Italian government bonds, secondly other government backed agency securities of Eurozone. The duration of portfolio could be up to 10Ys.

0P0000W6G5.F.manager_bio: Leads Portfolio Manager of Pioneer F - Euro Reserve. Cosimo joined PioneerInvestm in 2000 after completing a Masters in Asset Mgm from Bocconi Univ, and Univ College Dublin. Before the Masters he worked as a Fixed Income Ptf Manager with Euroconsult in Milan. Previously worked as a Fixed Income Trader with Banca Akros in Milan. Cosimo is a Business Engineer graduate of Milan Politechnical with qualific in Fixed Income Ptf Mgm from Bocconi Univ. Cosimo works closely with a team of fixed income specialists.

0P0001I496.F.summary: The investment objective of the Fund is to provide investors with a total return, taking into account both capital and income returns, and which reflects the total return of the Index. The Fund will aim to match the performance of the Index as part of this objective.

AT0000857719.VI.summary: Spar Trust Europa mostly invests in European fixed interest securities.

AT0000858022.VI.summary: The investment objective of the ESPA BOND COMBIRENT fund is to generate regular income equalling the average market yield of Eurozone bonds. The fund invests mainly in euro-denominated government bonds issued or guaranteed by issuers from Europe and in euro-denominated debentures issued by credit institutions headquartered in Europe.
